Trigger.name: Diagnose another
Trigger.script:
if not svo.diagnosing or not svo.diagnosing[multimatches[1][2]] then echo(" (i)") setTriggerStayOpen("Diagnose another", 0) return end
svo.currently_diagnosing = { name = multimatches[1][2], affs = {} }
moveCursor(0, getLineNumber()-1) moveCursor(#getCurrentLine(), getLineNumber()) insertText(" (will be healing "..svo.currently_diagnosing.name..")")
svo.prompttrigger("svo heal another", svo.healothersaff)

regexCodeList.string: has a been suffused with the void.
covered in a rime of frost.
suffused with an aura of fire.
being plagued by a blustering gale.
plagued by the rapid growth of a heartseed.
bleeding profusely from a lacerated throat.
losing the bond with the animal spirits.
afflicted by a crippled right arm.
afflicted by a broken right arm.
afflicted by a crippled left arm.
afflicted by a broken left arm.
afflicted by a crippled right leg.
afflicted by a broken right leg.
afflicted by a crippled left leg.
afflicted by a broken left leg.
afflicted with the curse of the Aeon.
has a partially damaged right arm.
has a partially damaged left arm.
has a partially damaged right leg.
has a partially damaged left leg.
surrounded by the aura of justice.
suffering from a tempered choleric humour.
suffering from a tempered melancholic humour.
suffering from a tempered phlegmatic humour.
suffering from a tempered sanguine humour.
surrounded in vestiges of kai energy.

Trigger.name: They're ok
Trigger.script: --disableTrigger("Diagnose another") disabled because it should time out. this allows for multi-person heals

Alias.name: Cure another
Alias.script:
enableTrigger("Diagnose another") if svo.ph_timer then killTimer(svo.ph_timer) end svo.ph_timer = tempTimer(5, [[disableTrigger'Diagnose another'; svo.ph_timer = nil]])
svo.diagnosing = {} for w in string.gmatch(matches[2], "%a+") do local w = string.title(w) svo.diagnosing[w] = true -- keep track of whom are we healing, so we don't fall to illusions if svo.bals.balance and svo.bals.equilibrium then send("diag "..w) else if not table.contains(svo.me.dofreequeue, "diag "..w) then svo.me.dofreequeue[#svo.me.dofreequeue+1] = "diag "..w end end end if not (svo.bals.balance and svo.bals.equilibrium) then svo.echof("Queue'd diagnosing of %s", svo.oneconcat(svo.diagnosing)) end

Alias.name: Cure an enemy
Alias.script:
local p = matches[2] or target
if not p then svo.echof("Don't know who to cure, 'target' isn't set.") return end
for w in string.gmatch(p, "%a+") do sendAll( "heal "..w.." deaf", "heal "..w.." blind", "heal "..w.." insomnia", false) end
raiseEvent("svo healed enemy", p)
